WRITING.TEXT: Thank you, I guess that its about contrast, I enjoy drawing stuff on the darker side but with happy colours and same with the physics of the beasts. Powerful bodys with weak foundations.
Thank you :)
Geil! ! Ist das auf Marker papier Hello, I dont really speak german but I think you are asking if its markers on paper? If so, yes it is but the paper is stained with coffee and roughness :P

Well its 2016 and Im trying to draw something new every morning or at least every two days again, this is the latest one.

I found it weird how well preserved Dogmeats DNA seemed to be, I think this would be more appropriate :P

WRITING.TITLE: The not so well preserved Dogmeat. (Fallout 4 inspired illustration)

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you, its Ballpoint pen 0.4 of the brand high tech (really cheap stuff) Then its copic markers and staedtler colour pencils. There is a few more things but it varies from drawing to drawing, its just what I have within reach at my drawing table pretty much. It works just fine to only use the cheap staedtler colour pencils as well if copic markers are to expensive. Hope that helps :)
Thank you! I was thinking more like Bambi, BAM, boxer... It was funny when I was tired haha :) But your version works just as well!
As Im a tattoo artist myself it would hurt my little artist heart a little haha.
Thank you!

WRITING.TEXT: Well it got the fanzy name b.n.t/home :P I love it but the last time I was in Sweden all the stores where I usually buy it had changed brand so Im on my last sketchbook now and starting to panic a bit haha. I really love this sketchbook. The only bad thing about it is that very often it got pressure marks that can run trough the whole thing to the end.
Well okidoki then
